thepeopleofsingapore:

I was repeatedly raped between the age of 15 to 16. He was a friend of the family - a colleague of my mother who she let stay on weekends because he was not local - he didnât have a home in Singapore. The first time it happened, he had already been staying with us for a year. We trusted him.

Initially, I tried to fight him off but he overpowered me. Then he made threats. He said if I didnât do what he wanted - or if I told - he would hurt me and my family. I was very scared. I didnât tell anyone.
